attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see more done to people who commit cruelty to animals the punishments in force today 19/02/2007 are so unreal there should be a tougher sentence to offenders that break this law , animals have rights as well and im here to make sure they get the respect they should be getting and if there is a a cruelty case it will be dealt with with the upmost severe consequences .

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
